tool_description: This API offers a powerful tool that enables you to query the traffic and key performance metrics for any website. It includes a wide range of metrics such as engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking, and traffic sources, among others. Moreover, we confidently provide the lowest prices on the market, ensuring that you not only gain access to these valuable insights but also enjoy unparalleled cost-effectiveness
name: Similarweb Traffic
title: Similarweb Traffic

api_list.name: traffic
api_list.description: get traffic data by domain or hostname
